definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Also, it would be best to stick with darker stripes, because contrasting colors add more depth.
sentences.chinese: 暗條紋也是個絕佳之選，因爲對比色會增加視覺深度。

sentences.english: Go around the edge of each leaf rubbing with a crayon of a contrasting color.
sentences.chinese: 用對比色勾出每張葉子拓片的邊緣。

sentences.english: Use a mix of contrasting colors to create a dynamic feel.
sentences.chinese: 運用混合的對比色可以營造一種很有活力的感覺。

sentences.english: Our eyes are naturally drawn to contrast, we simply can't help but look!
sentences.chinese: 我們的眼睛會非常自然地被對比色所吸引而不能自拔。

sentences.english: Chief among them was contrasting color.
sentences.chinese: 其中第一個理論就是對比色。

sentences.english: The contrasting colors created an interesting visual effect.
sentences.chinese: 對比色製造了一個有趣的視覺效果。

sentences.english: Ring with ocean waves in contrasting white and yellow gold.
sentences.chinese: 有海浪波紋的黃白對比色戒指。

sentences.english: The designer has chosen the complementary colours blue and orange.
sentences.chinese: 設計師選取了藍和橙黃兩種對比色。

sentences.english: Frequently, for a decorative touch, a contrasting color thread is used.
sentences.chinese: 這種縫型常用作裝飾格調，使用的線是對比色。

sentences.english: The dishes are divided into two types, meat dish and vegetable dish .
sentences.chinese: 通常一道肉類和素菜有一個主色和兩至三個對比色。

sentences.english: Most likely, you’ll see what’s called the “contrasting” color.
sentences.chinese: 不出意外，您會看到被稱之爲“對比色”的顏色。

sentences.english: Use good contrast with the background to make your text easy to read.
sentences.chinese: 利用好的背景對比色可使你的演講更易讀。
